Title: Relates to flood insurance notice in communities bordering Lake Ontario
Summary: Relates to flood insurance notice in communities bordering Lake Ontario; requires the department of financial services to publish an annual notice with the department's contact information and a statement about flood insurance and how it relates to standard homeowners insurance policies in local newspapers that serve the communities bordering Lake Ontario.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to flood insurance notice in communities bordering Lake Ontario
